title: ess插件怎么设置玩家无法使用spawn home back
author: ccoo0101
txt_content:
ess插件怎么设置玩家无法使用spawn home back
求大神指点

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp <权限组> -essentials.home
/mangaddp <权限组> -essentials.back
/mangaddp <权限组> -essentials.spawn

如果你是直接改配置的，就把下列代码复制到要禁止的权限组即可。
    - -essentials.home
    - -essentials.back
    - -essentials.spawn复制代码

replies.author: zx1678338406
replies.txt_content: 在gm把权限删了就可以了

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Lucky777777 于 2015-1-25 13:25 编辑 

/mangaddp builder -essentials.spawn
  /mangaddp builder -essentials.back
  /mangaddp builder -essentials.home复制代码

replies.author: qq372137062
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp default essentials.spawn
/mangdelp default essentials.home
/mangdelp default essentials.back

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
Lucky777777 发表于 2015-1-25 12:13
最后一个拼错了
